author: Anonymous Calc
title: Still Not Registered in a Lab Section
question:
Hello,
I am not sure what to do since I have been trying to get into a lab section since this course began. I have emailed CPSC undergrad and they said they were going to add me over a week ago but I still haven't heard back. I have sent a follow up email yesterday as well. 
Any advice is appreciated as I have done everything on my part to get into the desired lab section.
Thanks
instructor_answer: @253 @254 All I can say is that Emily is really busy and will get to your request before the deadline. For now (and for everyone else who is waiting), please keep waiting patiently and avoid sending additional emails! She will get to it.
